game.name: Sudoku Dungeon
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Sudoku Dungeon is a turn-based fantasy tactical puzzle game mixing 9x9 Sudoku logic with dungeon crawling combat. Manage hero abilities, enemy abilities, and more as you navigate through an 80-puzzle campaign. In Challenge Mode experiment with your own team compositions and optimize your solutions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sudoku Dungeon is a turn-based fantasy tactical puzzle game mixing 9x9 Sudoku logic with dungeon crawling combat. Manage hero abilities, enemy abilities, and more as you navigate through an 80-puzzle campaign. In Challenge Mode experiment with your own team compositions and optimize your solutions.
